data.message: I am not a sinner,neither a SAINT.people don't like me i don't COMPLAIN.bad things happened in my life it will happen AGAIN.but this is what motivates me adds to my GAIN.i did'nt forgive you because you eated up my BRAIN.i should have used ate but that's the PAIN.that i go through,i am gonna FAINT.my mind  ain't working can't handle this DAY.there are many things left to do TODAY.But i can't take it my energy FADES.But i control my mind nothing is the SAME.Back on my feet rise back up AGAIN.I can't FAIL,i can't lose this DAY.I must use the HATE in a positive WAY.Cuz at the end of the day in front of the MIRROR,i want to see a champion,not a LOSER.Now that hate motivates me makes me OBDURATE.i conquered this day and i feel GREAT.
